name: The Ritz-Carlton, Berlin

reviews.text: It's true, this hotel is excellant. If you can afford it (we had a freebie), stay here. Great service, good breakfast, AMAZING bathroom. End of!
reviews.title: Cannot fault it

likes.disliked: — There isn't anything not to like

reviews.text: Simply devine!!! Great location, staff, decor, amenities. The first class gym may be small but has brand new LCD attached monitors on the elliptical trainers and treadmills with free drinks, fresh fruit and replacement ear piece covers for the headsets. Exteme class on all levels, if you want a true 5 star European getaway at a reasonable rate look no further then this property. I look forward to returning with my family in the near future.
reviews.title: Ritzy Ritz in Berlin

likes.liked: — Great rooms with wireless internet, over the top bathrooms

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights, club level, weekend.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel in a great city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is probably the best hotel either of us has stayed in and we thought good value in comparison to the prices of other 5 star hotels in other capital cities. The service was very good and we found the staff friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great location close to the Berlin Wall and the Reichstag.

likes.disliked: — Lack of tea/coffee making facility in room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room- The bed was huge and extremely comfortable, bathroom well appointed with seperate walk in shower, large bath, separate toilet. Robes, slippers and nice toiletries. Used room service only for morning tea - arrived rapidly. Views from our room included the roof of the Sony centre and the old facade of the Hotel Esplanade now enclosed behind a protective case.
reviews.title: Standard 5 Class Fare

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here in October last year. Booked a club room and was not disappointed. The club floor staff are absolutely superb and anticipate your every need. Everything in the club fllor, including champagne is included and is all served at your seat.
reviews.title: Excellent stay at the Ritz Carlton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate in Debrosses Brasserie which was also superb and reasonably priced. Would I go back again? Absoultely!
reviews.title: The place to stay!

reviews.text: We booked the hotel for 5 nights (beginning of January) at a winter special rate of €195 with breakfast. In addition to the extravagant buffet, the breakfast includes omelets etc prepared to order in the open kitchen.
reviews.title: Opulence with a reasonable price tag

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at 9:00 AM and we were immediately shown to our room. So quiet and the bed so good, we didn't wake until 3:00 PM when we taxied to KaDeWe for oysters and glasses of Riesling on the Feinschmecker (gourmet) floor. If you are a foodie, this floor is a great experience.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: The staff is really friendly; no snooty airs here. Kudos to the doorman who put the fear of God into a taxi driver who took us the long way around to boost the fare.
reviews.title: Berlin Luxury

reviews.text: Great location, superb service. great prices. Fresh rooms!
reviews.title: Great!
Ritz Carlton true 5 star
reviews.text: A hotel that shows the way.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Delivered true 5 star service in 5 star accomodation. Club lounge excellent. Staff knowledgeable and spoke excellent English. Great location. Couldn't have asked for better.
reviews.title: loved the ritz

description: Located in the heart of Berlin, on prestigious Potsdamer Platz, within walking distance to the Sony Center, renowned shopping galleries, the Brandenburg Gate, the Diplomatic and Government District and the heart of cultural Berlin.
